flawed_nl_solution:
8 years ago James had 20-8=<<20-8=12>>12 years
So 8 years ago John had 12*2=42 years experience
That means John has 42+8=<<42+8=50>>50 years experience
So Mike has 50-16=<<50-16=34>>34 years of experience
So together they have 20+50+34=<<20+50+34=104>>104 years experience
#### 104

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 24, not 42. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
